title: Does religion have a place in a secular state? Får religionen plats i en sekulär stat?
description: The reason for having a secular state was to have equal space for all, religious and non-religious citizens. How can we accommodate everybody in the state and give them equal space? How can we live together? In is possible in the midst of diversity?
extendedDescription:
Universal Declaration of Human Rights Article 2: 
Everyone is entitled to all the rights and freedoms set forth in this Declaration, without distinction of any kind, such as race, colour, sex, language, religion, political or other opinion, national or social origin, property, birth or other status. 
Evenemanget kommer att tolkas till svenska.
